stories.headline: LATIN AMERICAN CAR: A bumpy ride
stories.summary: Explores the state of computer-assisted reporting (CAR) in Latin America, highlighting its growth in Mexico and Brazil, while noting the challenges faced in other regions such as Central America.

stories.headline: Program for disabled misses the mark
stories.summary: Investigates a federal contracting program meant to employ the severely disabled, uncovering misuse and inefficiency, leading to an FBI investigation.

stories.headline: AIR SAFETY: Poor conditions plague medical helicopters
stories.summary: Analyzes air ambulance safety, uncovering a higher rate of crashes due to factors like poor weather conditions and pilot errors, highlighting gaps in safety regulations.
